LanguageData.RM_ShardBuildup.label: crystalline buildup
LanguageData.RM_ShardBuildup.description: Not yet exploded crystalline shards sticking out of the body. Will cause a supercombine explosion when hitting 100%.
LanguageData.RM_SentinelBerserk.label: target sensor scramble
LanguageData.RM_SentinelBerserk.description: The mechanoids target sensor is scrambled, it can no longer can no longer differentiate between friendly and hostile.
LanguageData.RM_BehemothAttack.label: behemoth attack
LanguageData.RM_ZealotInvisibility.label: zealot invisibility
LanguageData.RM_ZealotInvisibility.description: This mechanoid has the ability to turn itself invisible.
LanguageData.RM_LocustBeamEffect.label: locust beam
LanguageData.RM_LocustBeamEffect.description: The Locust’s primary beam weapon, powerful enough to melt reinforced plasteel and vaporise flesh.
